search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Hyros (hyros.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Hyros can be found at: [https://hyros.com/pricing](https://hyros.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Get Started With HYROS
----------------------

Are you an Agency? Click here for Agency Pricing

Not an Agency? Click here for Business Pricing

Pricing as low as

$230

$353

$583

$999

$1,499

Custom

Per month w/annual plan

Tracked Monthly Revenue

Up to20k

Up to40k

Up to83k

Up to250k

Up to750k

Up to2m

This plan has:

VIP Support

VIP Paid Traffic

This plan comes with full VIP support and all HYROS functionality. Each account is customized to the users business model and assigned a 1 to 1 analyst TRAINED in the users business type. Due to this level of customization we require a quick call to set you up.

Total

$230$353$583$999$1,499CustomCustomCustom /per month

VIP SUPPORT

[book demo](https://hyros.com/grow-call-clean-2.html)

Agency

Agencies receive pricing based on the amount of clients they bring to HYROS

Agencies also get:

Up to 40% comissions

Exclusive access

Access to special offers for clients

Total

CUSTOM

VIP SUPPORT

[book demo](https://hyros.com/agency-book.html)

What does this come with EVERYTHING? One plan covers it all
-----------------------------------------------------------

Paid Traffic

FULL PAID TRAFFIC AND AI OPTIMIZATION

See features based on your business model:

*   Full print tracking and attribution
*   ALL ad platforms
*   Al ad optimization
*   1 to 1 Dedicated Support, Data analyst & set Up
*   Full API access
*   Advanced and custom attribution

*   In depth creative reporting
*   Full customer journey
*   Attributed LTV, subscriptions and forecasting
*   Organic & social tracking
*   All integrations
*   Unlimited reports

We don't hide/limit tracking feature

behind paywalls and upsales. You just get what you pay for.

[Get started](https://hyros.com/grow-call-clean-2.html)

![Image 1: HYROS](https://hyros.com/assets-green-2023/img/sign.svg)

### Why Do We Require Demos

When you sign up you get a direct rep and custom set up. We need to make sure your tech stack can plug in AND assign an expert in your specific business model.

[Book demo](https://hyros.com/grow-call-clean-2.html)

Your Opt Out Preference Signal is Honored

Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Data
-------------------------------------

When you visit our website, we may store and retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information is used to manage your preferences, enable website functionality, help us understand how you use our website, and assist us in our marketing efforts. You can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and to change our default settings. Blocking some types of cookies, however, may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://www.hyros.com/cookies.html)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for our website to function and cannot be disabled.

#### Share Or Sale of Personal Data

 Share Or Sale of Personal Data

You have the right to opt out of the sale of your information to third parties and the sharing of your personal information for targeted advertising purposes. You may exercise your right to opt out of the sale or sharing of personal information by using this setting. Alternatively, you may contact us at [privacy@hyros.com](mailto:privacy@hyros.com) to exercise this right.

*   ##### Analytics Cookies
    
     Switch Label label
    
    These cookies allow us to better understand visitors to our website so we can improve performance and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.
    

*   ##### Targeting and Advertising Cookies
    
     Switch Label label
    
    Our advertising partners may set these cookies. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant ads on other sites. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
